entry.title: https://github.com/theihasan/geezap
entry.content: Geezap is an AI-powered job aggregation platform built with Laravel that unifies job listings from LinkedIn, Upwork, Indeed, and ZipRecruiter. Features include smart job matching, automated cover letter generation, and application tracking.

entry.title: https://github.com/krayin/laravel-crm
entry.content: Free & Opensource Laravel CRM solution for SMEs and Enterprises for complete customer lifecycle management.
